original_text: Egypt shall be a desolation, and Edom shall be a desolate wilderness, for the violence against the children of Judah, because they have shed innocent blood in their land.
korean_text: 그러나 애굽은 황무지가 되겠고 에돔은 황무한 들이 되리니 이는 그들이 유다 자손에게 포악을 행하여 무죄한 피를 그 땅에서 흘렸음이니라

sentences.original_text: and Edom shall be a desolate wilderness
for the violence against the children of Judah
because they have shed innocent blood
